Client.Name: IDEAM - Instituto de Hidrología, Meteorología y Estudios Ambientales

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The IDEAM radar network consists of 4 dual-polarization C-band radars used to monitor precipitation behavior in the atmosphere at intervals of 5 to 10 minutes, depending on weather conditions. These radars are primarily used in the operation of national airports, weather forecasting, and research focused on analyzing the data collected to date by each of these systems.
